uk.ac.aber.guidedwalk.android

Class SpecialMapOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
      • uk.ac.aber.guidedwalk.android.SpecialMapOverlay

  • public class SpecialMapOverlay
extends
    This Class extends the ItermizedOverlay Class. This class is responsible for the list of items that will be overlaid on the map display. This class will also deal with the events caused by the overlaid items.
    Author:
    Karl Parry (kdp8)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpecialMapOverlay(Drawable defaultMarker) 
      SpecialMapOverlay(Drawable defaultMarker, MapScreen mapscreen)
      Constructor that links the map context to the overlay as well as defining the default icon for the items on the overlay.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMapController(MapController mControl)
      This method adds the map controller to the Class providing the ability to control the map using the overlaid items.
      void addWalk(Walk walk)
      This method adds the walk to the Class providing information, such as the waypoint details, so this can be used to create the guided walk.
      void addWaypoint(OverlayItem waypoint, int index, int size)
      The method that deals with the icon choices when an item is added to the overlay.
      void draw(Canvas canvas, MapView mapv, boolean shadow) 
      int size()

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpecialMapOverlay

        public SpecialMapOverlay(Drawable defaultMarker)

      • SpecialMapOverlay

        public SpecialMapOverlay(Drawable defaultMarker,
                 MapScreen mapscreen)
        Constructor that links the map context to the overlay as well as defining the default icon for the items on the overlay.
        Parameters:
        defaultMarker - default icon for the marker
        mapscreen - map context passed from the Activity Class implementing this overlay.

    • Method Detail

      • size

        public int size()

      • addWaypoint

        public void addWaypoint(OverlayItem waypoint,
               int index,
               int size)
        The method that deals with the icon choices when an item is added to the overlay. This code was influenced by the following site: - http://developmentality. wordpress.com/2009/10/16/android-overlayitemsetmarkerdrawable-icon/
        Parameters:
        waypoint - the overlayitem referring the the waypoint that will be displayed on the map.
        index - the index of the waypoint in the list of waypoints.
        size - the size of the list of waypoints.

      • draw

        public void draw(Canvas canvas,
        MapView mapv,
        boolean shadow)

      • addMapController

        public void addMapController(MapController mControl)
        This method adds the map controller to the Class providing the ability to control the map using the overlaid items.
        Parameters:
        mControl - the map controller passed from the MapActivity Class.

      • addWalk

        public void addWalk(Walk walk)
        This method adds the walk to the Class providing information, such as the waypoint details, so this can be used to create the guided walk.
        Parameters:
        walk - the walk that was selected and loaded.
